players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I killed Bob last night. Keep an eye on Diana; she might be the detective."
Diana: "I am the detective and I investigated Charlie, who is the mafioso. Keep an eye on Alice; she might be lying."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
